posts.content:
1.Rikki James - 1954 samba
2. Gez Ensine - 1967 samba
3. Paul & Jade - 1967 SO42
4. Scott - 1957 PGSG (Sunday)
5. Kate & Mark - 1967 deluxe (Saturday}
6. Gary & Sally - 1967 (Saturday Only)
7. Dougy & Nikki 1957 dove blue camper(Saturday)
8. Grant and Sue - 1960 Crew Cab (Saturday)
9. Rob Godfrey - 1960 Rat Samba (Saturday only)
10. Susie Perrin - 1967 sliding door micro bus
11. Claude Buisan - 1960 Tesoro (Saturday)
12. Karl - 1960 Mango 11 window
13. Greg - 1967 SA Double cab
14. Paul De Groot - 1954 kombi
15. Scotty - 1952 Konbi
16. Ben Atherton- 1967 Turquoise Kombi (both days)
17. Russell King - 1960 Dove Blue Camper (weekend)
18. Mark Paine - 1966 Caravette
19. Nige. Rustina ‘65 Kombi
20. Phil & Sasha - 1960 mango samba (Saturday only please).
21. Martin - 1964 Dove Blue Double Cab (Sunday, maybe Saturday)
22. Simon - 1967 Kombi (late UK shiny Split) - Saturday / Sunday

Numbers are looking good, thanks everyone.
Also: Please don't forget, if you are attending the show and are not in the inner display, Please park on the external club display area, just to the left of the main entrance doors. DO NOT just park in the normal car park! I have reserved this space specifically for you guys and need to fill it in order to hang on to it!

Looking forward to seeing you all

Cheers.

Rikki.

Be warned.... We had to pay to show our buses today.... that's a first... #NotComingBack

To clarify, you had to pay to show your bus on the SSVC stand?
Even though it was stated earlier you got a free pass?
Got here at 7:30 and had to pay to get in the ssvc area! £15! Each person!!
I may well park outside tomorrow then - for the extra couple of quid you’re able to leave when you want

What time in the morning do we need to get into the outer display for Sunday?

Dave Wragg 64 Titan red 11 window.

I should say all went fine yesterday morning regards entry. Everyone got free passes.
Thanks for organising Rikki!
Nice to hear Sunday you helped make the show a show and got free passes. Shame we all had to pay on the Saturday! It was a good day Sat anyway...Some lovely motors there to dribble at.
On a positive not you could have mentioned you got your £15 money back!!
Did people get their money back? I didn't.
